name: Kush Town: Sunrise (demo)
description:
Hello, gamers, 

I am in the process of designing a pixel art-style RPG for stoners, spiritualists, and anyone who loves cute idle games. I am proud to announce the development of  Kush Town: Sunrise, a calm, slow-paced indie weed game in which you reside in an old hippie town and plant, grow and sell the green goodness to the community.   The game should be nearing an alpha build by the end of January, if not sooner, and will be free to download and play. 

Available for Windows & Mac

DEMO includes

 -3+ NPCs to meet and sell to!

-Harvest weed 

-Explore the town

- basic tutorial

Full version (coming next year, also free)

-Sell items at local dispo

- 8+ different strains 

-12+ NPCs to meet

-Buffs and upgrades

-personal garden/stash

-and MORE!

Feel free to leave a comment or question, idea, or report a bug!

(screenshots and demo provided are not fully reminiscent of all graphics in the game's final release)

Stay Blazed,

Sherriff
